div:
Mr. [**Name13 (STitle) 14211**] is an 85 yo
male ENTITY
with a
history ENTITY
of
HTN ENTITY
,
CRI ENTITY
,
anxiety ENTITY
, and recent
admission ENTITY
in [**1-20**] at OSH for
gastroenteritis ENTITY
, who is transfered to the
[**Hospital Unit ENTITY
Name 1**] from [**Hospital3 **] ICU (per his
family's request ENTITY
). The
patient ENTITY
presented to [**Hospital3 **]
ED ENTITY
on [**2112-3-2**] with
generalized weakness ENTITY
,
fever ENTITY
to 103F,
lethargy ENTITY
,
dyspnea ENTITY
, and was noted to have an oxygen saturation in the 70s on
RA ENTITY
(no prior oxygen requirement). He denied N/V/D,
abdominal pain ENTITY
,
change ENTITY
in
urinary habits ENTITY
, but did endorse orthopnea. He was
admitted ENTITY
to the
[**Hospital3 **] ENTITY
ICU ENTITY
for
severe ENTITY
respiratory failure ENTITY
.
CXR ENTITY
at that
time ENTITY
showed
evidence ENTITY
of
bilateral ENTITY
pneumonia ENTITY
(thought to be
aspiration ENTITY
), and he was noted to have a
leukocytosis ENTITY
of 14. Despite initial
treatment ENTITY
with
IV ceftriaxone ENTITY
,
azithromycin ENTITY
, and
solumedrol ENTITY
, the
patient ENTITY
was unable to tolerate taper off nonrebreather and required
BiPAP ENTITY
to help maintain
oxygen ENTITY
saturations ENTITY
. Given that he appeared worse both
clinically ENTITY
and by
xray ENTITY
,
antibiotics ENTITY
were switched to
levaquin ENTITY
, vanc, and
zosyn ENTITY
. Concern was also raised for
fluid ENTITY
overload ENTITY
contributing to his
respiratory failure ENTITY
, so he was
diuresed ENTITY
with 20 mg IV
lasix ENTITY
x 1 with good [**Name (NI) **] (pt fluid status +600cc at time of
transfer ENTITY
). An initial
sputum culture ENTITY
and
blood ENTITY
cultures ENTITY
x2 at the OSH were
negative ENTITY
. A repeat sputum culture,
urine ENTITY
Legionella ENTITY
, and
mycoplasma ENTITY
serology ENTITY
were done at the OSH and are pending at the time of
transfer ENTITY
. . The
patient ENTITY
has no history of
COPD ENTITY
or
CHF ENTITY
. Per his
daughter ENTITY
, he has never had an
echo ENTITY
. He had a
pneumovax ENTITY
in [**2109**] and
influenza vaccine ENTITY
in [**2110**]. . On the
floor ENTITY
,
initial ENTITY
vs were:
BP ENTITY
148/74, P 111,
RR ENTITY
33, with an O2sat of 95% on
CPAP ENTITY
80%FiO2 and 8
PEEP ENTITY
.
ABG ENTITY
was reassuring at 7.42/36/84. .
Patient ENTITY
is a DNR/DNI agrees to short term intubation to correct a treatable problem
Respiratory failure ENTITY
,
acute ENTITY
(not ARDS/[**Doctor Last Name 11**]) Assessment:
Patient ENTITY
arrived via
ambulance ENTITY
from
[**Hospital3 **] ENTITY
on
bipap ENTITY
. He was
tachypneic ENTITY
and
dyspneic ENTITY
but maintaining
o2 ENTITY
sats >94 until placed flat for
transfer ENTITY
from
stretcher ENTITY
to
bed ENTITY
and was taken off of the
bipap ENTITY
and placed on 100% nonrebreather o2 sats fell to the middle 80s.
Lungs ENTITY
clear with
crackles ENTITY
b/l.
WBC ENTITY
22.7 (on
steroids ENTITY
at OSH) lactate 1.7 Action: Placed on
cpap ENTITY
via
ventilator settings ENTITY
cpap ENTITY
80% 8
PEEP ENTITY
, cxr taken given 20mg lasix IV for
CHF ENTITY
, given
cipro IV ENTITY
, bld cx x 2 drawn
Response ENTITY
: Initial
output ENTITY
to IV lasix after 2 hrs 475cc. Maintaining
oxygen ENTITY
saturation ENTITY
of 99% appearing more
comfortable ENTITY
than on admit Plan: Continue antibx, vanco/zoysn/cipro, await bld cx results, obtain vanco level this am, obtain
sputum cx ENTITY
,
wean ENTITY
from
cpap ENTITY
and high fi02 as tolerated
Renal failure ENTITY
,
Chronic ENTITY
(
Chronic renal failure ENTITY
,
CRF ENTITY
,
Chronic kidney disease ENTITY
) Assessment: Bun 52 cr 1.8 foley in place diurisising Action: Given
lasix ENTITY
20mg Response: Diurising well Plan: Will recheck cxr
tomorrow ENTITY
, continue to
monitor ENTITY
, renally dose meds, monitor u/o, check
vanco ENTITY
level ENTITY
[**Last Name **]
Problem ENTITY
-
[**Name ENTITY
(
NI ENTITY
) 244**]
Description ENTITY
In Comments cardiac arrythmia Assessment:
EKG ENTITY
sinus tachycardia with freq pvc and pac RBBB, sbp 140/, denies cp, lytes wnl,
h/o htn ENTITY
,
hyperlipidemia ENTITY
Action: Ekg taken, lytes drawn
Response ENTITY
: ongoing Plan: ? checking
cardiac enzymes ENTITY
, TTE
today ENTITY
, ?
beta blocker ENTITY
decrease ENTITY
HR
ENTITY
